tips.colors: Bright reds, oranges, yellows, greens, blues, purples and pinks for candy colors. Whites for creamy fillings or sugar coatings. Browns for chocolates. Why let your candy creations suffer from a sugar slump? Make those sugary subjects pop with vivid neon splashes, shimmering pearl finishes or dazzling metallic accents!
tips.techniques: A. Color Combinations: For gummy candies, use bold primary colors like red, yellow and green. Add white highlights to create a glossy, gelatinous effect. B. Highlighting and Shadows: On a lollipop, use a red base coat. Add pink highlights on raised areas and shade the stick with maroon undertones.
tips.challenge: Let your taste buds and imagination indulge by coloring a whimsical candy-themed fantasy world with vibrant, mouthwatering landscapes! For example, depict gumdrop hills, chocolate rock formations, and a licorice river under a cotton candy sky. Embrace vivid color combinations and don’t be afraid to play with exaggerated, larger-than-life scales. This sugary wonderland encourages an explorative, unbounded approach.
